price: Nokorε sε, wo Wura Nyankopͻn bae akͻnhoma no mu dema obi a Ɔpε, εna Osusu (nso ma obi a Ɔpε). Nokorε sε N’ani tua Nenkoa (dwumadie) na Ohu nso..
arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقۡدِرُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ بِعِبَادِهِۦ خَبِيرَۢا بَصِيرٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna rabbaka yabsuṭu al-riz'qa liman yashāu wayaqdiru innahu kāna biʿibādihi khabīran baṣīran
